data.comment: The match has started at Carrow Road.
Goal! Preston take a 0-1 lead thanks to a Scott Sinclair spot-kick..
In the minute 25, Przemyslaw Placheta is on a sub for Kieran Dowell for Norwich.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Teemu Pukki.
Preston's Darnell Fisher has been booked in Norwich.
In the minute 42, Goal! The away team take a 1-2 lead through Darnell Fisher.
The first half has been concluded at Carrow Road.
The second-half is underway at Carrow Road.
In the minute 47, Xavier Quintilla (Norwich) gets a yellow card.
The home team replace Onel Hernandez with Adam Idah.
The away team have replaced Joe Rafferty with Andrew Hughes. This is the first substitution made today by Alex Neil.
In the minute 79, Alex Neil (Preston) is making a second substitution, with Jordan Storey replacing Ben Davies.
Brad Potts is replacing Alan Browne for the away team.
At Carrow Road, Scott Sinclair has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In the minute 85, Przemyslaw Placheta gets an equalizer for Norwich. The score is now 2-2.
Norwich make their third substitution with Jordan Hugill replacing Todd Cantwell.
It's 2-2 as the referee blows for full-time.
